document.full_text: the n.f.l. draft has become a lot like a football practice, for prospects and fans alike: a grueling, seemingly never-ending series of events and obstacles, conducted in pouring rain and stifling humidity.
document.title: working up a sweat, and that's well before the draft
lines_and_colors: the n.f.l. draft has become a lot like a football practice, for prospects and fans alike: a grueling, seemingly never-ending series of events and obstacles, conducted in pouring rain and stifling humidity.
